definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
oboe-like musical instrument used in folk music of Gansu, Qinghai etc/(onom.) meow/kitty kitty!/Mimi (Western name)/tits (i.e. slang for breasts)
oboe-like musical instrument used in folk music of Gansu, Qinghai etc/(onom.) meow/kitty kitty!/Mimi (Western name)/tits (i.e. slang for breasts)
Om Mani Padme Hum (Sanskrit), or Om Mani Peme Hung (Tibetan), the Avalokiteshvara mantra
pinyin: an3 ma5 ni2 ba1 mi1 hong1

definition: (Tw) gift given when visiting sb (esp. a local specialty brought back from one's travels, or a special product of one's own country taken overseas) (loanword from Japanese "omiyage")

sentences.english: Objective To study the effects of several transdermal enhancers on the permeation of imiquirnod in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究几种促渗剂对咪喹莫特体外经皮渗透的影响。

sentences.english: Every knows that Sammy's the biggest apple-polisher in our company.
sentences.chinese: 大家都知道珊咪是我们公司最大的马屁精。
如何获得卡乐咪特许加盟信息？

sentences.english: Also the opening ceremony of the new Gumi Music Journey was held in our pavilion.
sentences.chinese: 同时新的咕咪音乐之旅启动仪式也在我们馆举行。

sentences.english: Me a name I call my-self.
Special microphone-core design, sound effects better.
sentences.chinese: 特殊的咪芯设计，音色效果更佳。

sentences.english: Translating Mamma Mia! into Mandarin is meant to start the long process of bridging that gap.
sentences.chinese: 将妈妈咪呀翻译成中文就是为了开始弥合这种隔阂。

sentences.english: Sandy, your mommy is here. Please come to the office.
sentences.chinese: 你的吗咪来了，请到办公室。

sentences.english: Lake Lugu, or "Xienami" in local dialect, is actually referring to Muhai, which means the sea of mother.
sentences.chinese: 泸沽湖，当地人称“谢纳咪”，即母海的意思。

sentences.english: Miguel dreams about visiting Europe again.
This guy's name is Miguel and he is a Cuban.
sentences.chinese: 此公名为咪咕尔，古巴人氏。
《妈妈咪呀》音乐剧改变了那一切。

sentences.english: What do you think I mean, kitten.
sentences.chinese: 小喵咪，你认为我是什么意思？

sentences.english: Objective To the mechanism of thalidomide in the treatment of multiple myeloma(MM).
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨酞咪哌啶酮治疗多发性骨髓瘤的机制。

sentences.english: Though Miguel is black himself he doesn't like Caucasian guests of the capital like true Russians.
sentences.chinese: 咪咕尔为一黑人，如同正宗俄国人般嫌恶高加索人。

sentences.english: If there is such a thing as global culture, Mamma Mia! must be it.
sentences.chinese: 如果真有什么全球文化的话，妈妈咪呀无疑就是一个。

definition: phonetic ga (used in rendering Tibetan and Mongolian sounds)/Tibetan Ge: language of Buddha/(dialect) final particle similar to 了[le5] (esp. in Yunnan)
oboe-like musical instrument used in folk music of Gansu, Qinghai etc/(onom.) meow/kitty kitty!/Mimi (Western name)/tits (i.e. slang for breasts)
phonetic a, similar to 呵/-azine, see 吖嗪[a1 qin2]
the bleating of sheep/final particle which transforms statements into questions that indicate doubt or surprise (Cantonese)
to squint/what? (Cantonese)/see also 乜嘢[mie1 ye3]
oh (expression of agreement or surprise)/(Cantonese) not
(onom.) for the sound of a bird, an empty stomach etc
drat/frick/(euphemistic variant of 媽的|妈的[ma1 de5])
